document.full_text: jordan's islamist opposition could argue for constitutional change to curb the monarch's powers if it joined a government-appointed panel to discuss political reform, jordan's u.n. ambassador said on thursday.
document.title: no limits on jordan reform panel topics: u.n. envoy
lines_and_colors: jordan's islamist opposition could argue for constitutional change to curb the monarch's powers if it joined a government-appointed panel to discuss political reform, jordan's u.n. ambassador said on thursday.
